title: [Admission]Urgent help regarding round 2
content:
Will there be a seat surrender option like in round 1 for round 2 
Please help I have comedk as backup

comments.body: No the last date to surrender your seat was 15th July. From now on if you already have a seat or if you take seat in 2nd round you will not get your money back if you choose to forfeit it.

they will probably allow you to surrender ur seat as they have to follow UGC norms which says u can surrender your seat and receive a full refund up to 15 days before college starts u can receive refund .Even after that you can receive refund but not full, they take 10 percent after that . You can check the ugc norms for more info
they said they plan on holding cet rounds and one more jee round so maybe they will extend the date especially because they have changed so many things multiple times
